definition: putting an end to all debate or action
details:
adjective
- putting an end to all debate or action
= example: putting an end to all debate or action
- not allowing contradiction or refusal
= example: not allowing contradiction or refusal
- offensively self-assured or given to exercising usually unwarranted power
= synonyms: autocratic, magisterial, bossy, dominating, high-and-mighty
